ComicInfo.Title: If Colleges Advertised; The Hottest Questions in Basketball; Famous Scenes from Great Indian-Type Movies!; Room 5C; Cracked Takes a Look at Football; If Picture Postcards Told the Truth!; Super Heroes Around the World; Monsters in the News; Cracked Looks at Old-Time Songs; The Ape Man in a Hurry; Customized Career Cars; Things You Can Do By Telephone
ComicInfo.Summary: A jungle hero races home so that he can watch his favorite television show - about a jungle hero.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 22:42:19. [Issue ID 250420]
